project_abstract.cdata: The Second Irrigation and Rehabilitation Project will consist of rehabilitation and improvement of the Djatiluhur irrigation system, as well as studies relating to extension of the system and optimum use of the reservoir, and detailed engineering for a third irrigation rehabilitation project.

P003706.docty: Project Performance Assessment Report,Credit Agreement,Staff Appraisal Report
